introduction: Maximo Syntax is the premiere autonomous coding agent. Get ready to architect, code, debug, and boost your productivity like you've never seen before. To continue, Maximo Syntax requires an API key.
notice: To get started, this extension needs an API provider.
chooseProvider: To do its magic, Maximo Syntax needs an API key.

landing.introduction: Maximo Syntax is a free, open source AI coding agent with native Maximo AI integration. It works with Maximo Pandora models, Claude, Gemini, GPT, and 450+ more models.
landing.accountMention: Create a free Maximo AI account to get started with Pandora models - our specialized coding AI. Get $20 in bonus credits when you top-up for the first time!

providerSignup.heading: Choose your provider
providerSignup.chooseProvider: Maximo Syntax needs an LLM provider to work. Choose Maximo AI for the best experience with Pandora models, or use a 3rd-party provider.
providerSignup.rooCloudDescription: The best experience with native Pandora 3 & 3.5 models - specialized for coding tasks. Free tier available with generous limits.
providerSignup.useAnotherProviderDescription: Use OpenRouter, Anthropic, OpenAI, or other providers.
providerSignup.noApiKeys: Don't want to deal with API keys and separate accounts?

waitingForCloud.heading: Logging into Maximo AI...
waitingForCloud.description: We'll take you to your browser to sign up for Maximo AI. We'll then bring you back here to finish.
waitingForCloud.noPrompt: If you don't get prompted to open a URL, <clickHere>click here</clickHere>.
waitingForCloud.havingTrouble: If you've completed sign up but are having trouble, <clickHere>click here</clickHere>.
waitingForCloud.pasteUrl: Paste the callback URL shown in your browser:
waitingForCloud.invalidURL: That doesn't look like a valid callback URL. Please copy what Maximo AI is showing in your browser.

startRouter: We recommend using Maximo AI for the best experience:
startCustom: Or you can bring your provider API key:

telemetry.helpImproveMessage: Maximo Syntax collects error and usage data to help us fix bugs and improve the extension. This telemetry does not collect code, prompts or personal information. You can turn this off in <settingsLink>settings</settingsLink>.
